haiexplorer

haiexplorer provides the Germany PPS 2011 HAI burden dataset and a Shiny app to explore DALYs = YLL + YLD, cases and deaths across HAP, UTI, BSI, SSI and CDI.

  • Launch the app: haiexplorer::launch_app()
  • Dataset: hai_germany_2011 (with 95% intervals and YLL/YLD breakdown)
  • Article: Getting started (see Articles tab)

Why this app?

The interactive metric switch + YLL/YLD stacking helps users see whether burden is driven by mortality (YLL) or morbidity (YLD). Top-N and type filters guide a clear conclusion.
